snippet: The emergency federal unemployment-insurance program is soon to expire, and the new bipartisan budget deal reached in Congress does not include an extension.
abstract: New bipartisan budget deal does not include an extension for the emergency federal unemployment-insurance program, which will soon expire; lapse would cause 1.3 million current beneficiaries will lose aid.
lead_paragraph: The emergency federal unemployment-insurance program is soon to expire, and the new bipartisan budget deal reached in Congress does not include an extension.

headline.main: Jobless Fear Looming Cutoff of Benefits
headline.print_headline: Jobless Fear Looming Cutoff of Benefits
